Geography: ancient city of Huai Qing Fu (modern Jiaozuo City)
500 to 1,300 meters altitude, wet moist areas next to ditches and streams or along the roads
Maladies Treated: weakness and pain in loin and knees
postpartum pain in abdomen due to blood stasis
Raw huai niu xi is effective for breaking blood stasis
Cooked huai niu xi is effective for strengthening muscles and bones, promoting urination and strengthening essence of the body
Medical Function: Anti-hypertensive effect: the ingredient alkaloid of niu xi possesses good antihypertensive effect. It is proven that combining with other antihypertensive medication can produce satisfactory and safe result.
Anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect: the alcohol extract of niu xi promotes circulation and can arrest pain due to hematoma and possesses anti-inflammation and resolution effect.
Improving immune system: the achyranthes bidentata polysaccharide can enhance the immune system.
Stimulating uterus effect: the extract of niu xi can make the tense uterus muscles of guinea pigs relax thus can produce the strong contraction force.
Anti-aging effect: the active ingredient ecdysterone can improve liver function, lower cholesterol, improve the activities of cells.
Diuretic effect: giving anesthetized rabbits intravenous injection of niu xi decoction or alcohol extract has a mild diuretic effect.
Anti spasm effect: it possesses a mild inhibiting effect on digestive tract.
Samples of Formulae: niu che shen qi wan 牛車腎氣丸
Contraindications: not to use during pregnancy, diarrhea due to pixu (spleen deficient), excessive menstruation or spermatorrhea due qixu (qi deficient). Not to use with bai qian.

Chemical Components: various insect adjustment hormones (昆虫變態激素)
trace elements: nickel 5.4 ppm, iron 19.6 ppm, copper 6.3 ppm, manganese 33.5 ppm, chromium 1.5 ppm

References: Source: Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草；Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中药大辞典

It was mainly grown in the ancient city of Huai Qing Fu, where it get its name "huai" niu xi.陝西，甘肅，河南等省。生於海拔500-1300米山區的陰濕水溝邊，路旁和河 岸。 ，主產於河南，因產於古懷慶府(今焦作市)而得名。Properties characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, sour, neutral苦﹐酸﹐平。Channels  meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, kidney.肝﹐腎。Medical functions:藥理﹕ Anti-hypertensive effect: the ingredient alkaloid of niu xi possesses good antihypertensive effect. It is proven that combining with other antihypertensive medication can produce satisfactory and safe result.Anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect: the alcohol extract of niu xi promote circulation and can arrest pain due to hematoma and possesses anti-inflammation and resolution effect.Improving immune system: the achyranthes bidentata polysaccharide can enhance the immune system.Stimulating uterus effect: the extract of niu xi can make the tense uterus muscles of guinea pigs relax thus can produce  the strong contraction force.Anti-aging effect: the active ingredient ecdysterone can improve liver function, lower cholesterol, improve the activities of cells.diuretic effect:Anti spasm effect: it possesses a mild inhibiting effect on digestive tract.1，有降壓 作用。懷牛膝中所含生物鹼，具有良好的降壓作用，與其他藥物配合應用，治療高血壓病，心血管病，已取得安全，可靠的效果。 2，抗炎與鎮痛作用。牛膝酒制後，有明顯的活血止痛作用，對於淤血所致疼痛症狀有緩解作用。懷牛膝鎮痛效果最佳。牛膝提取液有強抗炎 消腫作用。其機理為提高機體免疫能力，擴張血管，改善循環，促進炎性病變吸收等。 3，增強免疫功能。傳統認為懷牛膝偏於補益肝腎，強壯筋骨，現代藥理研究表明，懷牛膝富含牛膝多糖，（半乳糖，葡萄糖，甘露糖）有明顯的增強體液 免疫功能作用。 4，興奮子宮作用。本品的流浸膏使豚鼠子宮的肌肉緊張多呈弛緩作用，使受孕子宮發生強有力的收縮。 5，懷牛膝有效成分及提取液均有一定的抗衰老作用。懷牛膝中所含的促脫皮甾酮能改善肝功能 ，降低血漿膽固醇，有增強細胞活性的作用。 6，有利尿作用。麻醉兔或大靜脈注射牛膝煎劑或醇提液有輕度利尿作用。 7，解痙作用。對動物胃 腸有輕度抑制作用。Actions & Indications:主治﹕damp cold, weakness and pain in loin and knees, tight and spastic limbs, irregular menses, postpartum pain in abdomen due to blood stasis, afterbirth not being expelled, blood in urine, physical injuries and difficulty in bending knees.Raw huai niu xi is effective for breaking blood stasis.Cooked huai niu xi is effective for strengthening muscles and bones, promoting urination and strengthening essence of the body.寒湿，腰膝骨疼，腰膝酸軟，四肢拘挛，經血不調，產後瘀血腹疼，胎衣不下，血淋，跌打損傷及屈膝 障碍 。生用可散惡 血，破癥結。 熟用可補肝腎，強筋骨，利尿強精。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕The roots and stems contain: achyranthes bidentata polysaccharide,  ecdysterone (molding hormone of insects), inokosterone, and various adjustment hormones of insect and triterpenoid saponins, mucilage, potassium salt, and trace elements of nickel 5.4, iron 19.6, copper 6.3, manganese, chronium 1.5 (ppm).根和莖包含：牛膝多醣，羥基促 脫皮甾酮（ecdysterone)，牛膝甾酮（inokosterone）等多種昆虫變態激素和三萜皂甙。此外尚含粘液質及鉀鹽。微量元素有鎳5.4， 鐵19.6，銅6.3，錳33.5，鉻1.5（ppm）。Dosage:用 量﹕9 to 15 g9~15 克。Samples of formulae:處方 舉例﹕niu che shen qi wan 牛車腎氣丸Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕not to use during pregnancy, diarrhea due to pixu (spleen deficient) ,  excessive menstruation or spermatorrhea due qixu (qi deficient). Not to use with bai qian .懷孕﹐脾虛腹瀉﹐月經過多﹐ 氣虛遺精 忌用。 不可與白前同用。Source: Zhong Hua Ben Cao  中華本草:；: Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中药大辞典Search this siteProblems with website? Please Click here for comment. Name: chan su
蟾酥
Biological: Bufo bufo gargarizans Cantor 中華大蟾蜍
Bufo bufo melanostictua Schneider 黑眶蟾蜍

Maladies Treated: food poisoning resulting in stomach pain, bloating, continuous vomiting and diarrhea, even fainting; often combined with she xiang (musk), ding xiang (clove), cang zhu (atractylodes), such as in the formula chan su wan

bunacles, scofula, swollen and painful throat, various types of toothache; combined with xiong huang (realgar), ku fan (calcined alum), zhu sha (cinnabar), made into mung bean-sized pills; taken with decoction of white parts of green onion as described in 'wai ke zheng zong' chan su wan

scarlet fever (爛喉丹痧), throat wind (喉風), acute tonsillitis (乳蛾), swollen and painful throat (咽喉腫痛); commonly combined with niu huang (cattle gallstone), xiong huang (realgar), bing pian (borneol), such as in the formula liu shen wan
various cancers (liver cancer, intestine cancer, leukemia, skin cancer), used orally or externally, achieving certain degrees of therapeutic effect according to some reports
Medical Function: possesses rapid and long-lasting effect of raising blood pressure
significantly stimulates respiratory functions
Dosage: Use appropriate amount externally, powdered and mixed with plaster to apply to affected area. Internally: 0.015 to 0.03g (highly toxic).
Contraindications: Not to be taken during pregnancy. When applying externally, avoid contact with the eyes. If poisoning occurs, decoction of gan cao (licorice) 30g, bai ji (Bletilla striata) 30g should be taken as antidote.
Notes: Chan su is a secretion obtained from the adrenal gland near the ear and skin glands of toads. The variety of chemical composition varies depending on original animal species, geographical origin, harvesting times, and processing methods.
Chemical Ingredients: Steroid-type cardiac stimulant compounds (more than 10 types), mostly decomposition products resulting from drying processing, such as cinobufagin (approximately 5%), resibufogenin RBG (~3.4%), bufalin (~1.5%), telocinobufagin (~1.4%), marinobufagin and others. Other similar cardiac glycosides present include digitoxigenin, sarmentogenin. These compounds often form ester combinations with arginine or fatty acid derivatives like suberoylarginine, pimeloylarginine, succinoylarginine, suberic acid, sulfuric acid, etc., collectively termed bufotoxins, generally existing in the secretions of toads before processing.
Indole type alkaloids including bufotenine, bufotenidine, dehydrobufotenine, bufothionine, serotonin.

Mainly produced in Hebei, Shandong, Sichuan, Hunan, Jiangsu, Zhejiang provinces.全國大部分地區都有分布，主產於河北、山東、四川、湖南、江蘇、浙江等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕acrid, warm, toxic.辛，溫。有毒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕heart, kidney, stomach腎， 胃，心經。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕For food poisoning with stomach pain and bloating, vomiting with diarrhea, even fainting. Usually combine with she xiang, ding xiang, cang zhu, like formula called chan su wan.   For bunacles, scofula, painful and swollen throat and various kinds of toothache: combine with xiong huang, ku fan, zhu sha etc. Make into pills the sizes of mung beans. Take five pills each time with decoction of white portions of green onion. For scarlet fever usually combine with niu huang, xiong huang, bing pian, like liu shen wan. Being used in various types of cancer, like liver cancer, intestine cancer, leukemia, skin cancer etc. Taking orally or external application have been successful to certain degree, according to some reports. Being used in respiratory and in circulatory exhaustion. It possesses the effect of raising blood pressure for long time. It also possesses respiratory stimulating effect. 1. 用於痧脹腹痛，吐瀉，神昏。飲食不潔所致的痧脹腹痛、吐瀉不止、甚則昏厥 之証，常與麝香、丁香、蒼術等配伍，如蟾酥丸。  2. 用於惡瘡，瘰疬，咽喉腫痛及各種牙痛。與雄黃、 枯礬、朱砂等配伍，為丸綠豆大，每服五丸，蔥白湯下；如《外科正宗》蟾酥丸。治療爛喉丹痧(猩紅熱)、喉風、乳蛾及咽喉腫痛，常與牛黃、雄黃、冰片等 配伍，如六神九。  3. 治療各種癌腫，如用治肝癌、腸癌、白血病、皮膚癌等，內服或外用，均取得一定的療效。4. 用於呼吸、循環衰竭，有迅速而持久的升壓作用，並有顯著的興奮呼吸作用。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕1. steroid type of cardiac stimulant there are more than 10 types, mostly are the product of the drying process of chan su, like cinobufagin, about 5%, resibufogenin RBG,2. Indole type of alkaloidsbufotenine, bufotenidine, dehydrobufotenine, bufothionine, and serotonin etc.  Also contain sterole, epinephrine and different animo acid.1. 強心甾體化合物為結構類似強心甙而有毒性的蟾毒配基類化合物，已知有10餘種，大多是干燥加 工過程中的分解產物，如華蟾毒配基（又名華蟾毒精cinobufagin）約5%，脂蟾毒 配基（resibufogenin RBG）約3.4%，蟾毒靈約1.8%，羥基華蟾毒基 約1.6%，蟾毒配質 (bufotalin) 約1.5%，遠華蟾毒基 (telocinobufagin) 約1.4%及海 蟾蜍精 (marinobufagin) 等；另含洋地黃毒甙元、沙門甙元等。上述蟾毒配基常在C3與辛二酰精氨酸、庚二酰精氨酸、丁二酰精氨酸、辛二酸、硫酸等結合成酯類，統稱為蟾毒類 ，多存在於加工前 的蟾蜍分泌物中。蟾酥中蟾毒配基和蟾毒的種類及含量，可因原動物、產地、採制時間和方法不同而有差異。2. 吲哚類生物鹼 主要有蟾酥鹼 (bufotenine) 、蟾酥甲鹼 (bufotenidine) 、去氫蟾酥鹼 (dehydrobufotenine) 、蟾酥硫鹼 (bufothionine) 及5-羥色胺 等。 此外，含有甾醇類、腎上腺素及多種氨基酸。Dosage:用量﹕Use appropriate amount externally or mix with plaster and apply to affected areas. To take orally: 0.015 to 0.03g. (highly toxic).外用適量，研末調敷或入膏藥內貼患處。內服0.015～0.03g，入丸散。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕liu shen wan 六神丸Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Not to be taken during pregnancy. In externally application, avoid getting into the eyes. As antidote, make decoction with gan cao 30 g, bai ji 30 g and take orally.孕婦忌服。外用時注意不可入目。若 中毒時，可用甘 草30克 、白芨片30克煎服解之。  　蟾酥即蟾蜍耳上腺及皮膚腺 的分泌物。Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告  A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading              in progressClick here for comment. Name: mai ya
jiao mai ya
Biological: Hordeum sativum Jess. var. vulgar, Hack.

Medical Function: reduce the risk of coronary heart disease
lower blood sugar
lower blood pressure
beneficial for ulcerated colitis
contains hordenine that may stimulate the sympathetic nervous system
contains digestive enzymes that help digestion
Samples of Formulae: For indigestion: jiao san xian. For digestion, the herb should be lightly stir fried and seep in hot water. Overheating can destroy the amylase for digesting carbohydrates. Jiao mai ya: slightly stir fry germinated barley seeds with small fire in a frying pan till yellowish brown. Take out and spray with clean water and dry under the sun. It is called jiao mai ya. Its function is to promote digestion.
Contraindications: To avoid increasing the drug effect, not to take with ma huang (ephedra), caffeine, blood sugar-lowering drugs, blood pressure-lowering drugs, and cardiac function-enhancing drugs.
Research: Per FDA, barley-containing foods must provide at least 0.75 gram of soluble fiber per serving to qualify for the health claim of reducing coronary heart disease risk.[1][2]
References: [2] Per FDA, to qualify for the health claim, the barley-containing foods must provide at least 0.75 gram of soluble fiber per serving of the food. See [1]

mai ya,Complementary and Alternative Healing University

See [1] Jiao mai ya: slightly stir fry germinated barley seeds with small fire in a frying pan till yellowish brown. Take out and spray with clean water and dry under the sun. It is called jiao mai ya. Its function is to promote digestion. 焦麥芽經大麥發芽而成，將麥芽置鍋內微火炒至黃色，噴洒清水 ，取出晒亁，即為焦麥 芽。焦麥芽具有健脾和胃，舒肝化滯之功用 。 Search this siteProblems with website? Please Click here for comment. Maladies Treated: hot and dry bowel with constipation
Medical Function: promotes lactation
treats hot cough with sticky phlegm
treats hot and dry bowel with constipation
treats carbuncles
Contraindications: It is not suitable to use together with wu tou. Not to be taken by those who are pixu (spleen deficient) and/or with diarrhea.

gua lou zi, Complementary and Alternative Healing University     現代中藥辭典Complementary and Alternative Healing University  Home  中藥詞典Search this siteList of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryQigongTraditional Chinese Medicine (TCM)AcupuncturePrescribed Drug DictionaryBiochemistry DictionaryLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianGeneral Online LibraryResearch SitesViagraMassage/AcupressureHypnotherapyTell us what you wantNotify Changes & New Information  gua lou zi  瓜蔞子 (chk code) （in English and Chinese 中英文)By: Joe Hing Kwok Chu Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Semen TrichosanthisBotanical name:拉丁生物學名﹕Trichosanthes kirilowii, Maxim, or Trichosanthes japonica, Regel.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕karoninPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕kwalwiinPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕kwaa1 lau5 jan4Other Names:別名﹕gua lou ren 瓜蔞仁,gua lou ren 栝蔞仁，Common Name:
英文名﹕trichosanthes seed, 
Chinese cucumber seed.Distribution:產地﹕throughout China, especially in Shandong, Hebei, Shanxi, Shaanxi全中國，尤其是山東， 河北，山西，陕西。 Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕faint smell, bland.氣微，味淡。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕lung, stomach, large instestine肺，胃，大腸。Medical functions:藥理﹕ See tian hua fen page 看天花粉頁 Actions & Indications:主治﹕Being used in hot cough with sticky phlegm; hot and dry bowel with constipation. Also, being used in promoting mother's milk and for treating carbuncles.用於燥咳痰粘，腸燥便秘。下乳，治癰腫。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕9～15 gSamples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕It is not suitable to use together with wu tou. Name: huang qin
Biological: Scutellaria amoena C.H. Wright (滇黃芩, in Southern part of China)
Scutellaria viscidula Gge. (粘毛黃芩, in northeastern China)
Other name: tu jin cha gen 土金茶根

Maladies Treated: headache due to cold or flu
cough and asthma due to heat syndromes
vomiting of blood, nosebleeds, excessive menstrual bleeding and spotting (崩漏)
Medical Function: Clears damp-heat and dries fire
Stops bleeding
Calms fetus
Lowers liver fire
promotes secretion of bile (alcohol extract or baicalin, animal experiment)
promotes movements of extra body intestines of rabbits (Baicalein, animal experiment)
mild diarrhea effect
antihistamine effect: alkaloids inhibit edema of rats caused by carrageenin (animal experiment)
anti-allergenic effects: inhibits acute asthma attack and allergenic eczema
Baicalein has anti-toxin, inhibits permeability of capillaries, anti-acetylcholine and anti-anaphylaxis effects
broad spectrum antibiotic effect
prevents atherosclerosis: water extract orally administered to rabbits prevents experimentally-induced atherosclerosis (animal experiment)
blood thinning effect: Oroxylin A can promote enzyme producing nitrogen oxide, potential therapy for stroke and myocardial infarction
anti-hepatitis B virus [1]
prevents and intervenes formation of liver cirrhosis (huang qin decoction) [2]
Samples of Formulae: long dan xie gan tang (龍膽瀉肝湯), xiao xu ming tang (小續命湯), xiao chai hu tang (小柴胡湯), e jiao huang qin tang (阿膠黃芩湯)
Contraindications: not to use in case of pixu (spleen deficient) with weak digestion. Avoid using huang qin while on blood thinning medication.
Notes: Carrageenin: any of a group of closely related colloids derived from Irish moss and several other red algae, widely used as a thickening, stabilizing, emulsifying, or suspending agent in industrial, pharmaceutical, and food products (source: American Heritage Dictionary)
References: [2] Hebei Journal of Traditional Chinese Medicine Issue 01, year 2013

huang qin, Complementary and Alternative Healing University  現代醫藥詞典Complementary and Alternative Healing University

Wright (in Southern part of China)(滇黃芩)Scutellaria viscidula Gge. ( in northeastern China) 
（粘毛黃芩）
Scutellaria rehderiana Diels  (甘肅黃芩)
Scutellaria likiangensis Diels (麗江黃芩)
Scutellaria hypericifolia Levl (川黃芩)Pron. in Japanese:日語發 音 ：egonPron. in Korean:韓語發 音 ：kwanggumPron. in Cantonese:粵語發 音 ：wong4 kam4Common Name:英文名 ：baiscal skullcap root, scutellaria, scute Other Name:別名：
shan cha gen 山茶根，huang qin cha 黃芩茶，tu jin cha gen 土金茶根，
tiao qin 條芩，ku qin 枯芩Distribution:Hebei, Henan, Shanxi, Shandong, Inner Mongolia, Liaoning, JilinProperties (characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter,  cold苦﹐寒Channels (meridians) entered:歸經﹕gallbladder, large intestine, lung, stomach膽﹐大腸﹐肺 ﹐胃Actions & Indications:主治：
clears damp-heat and dries fire, stops bleeding, calms fetus, l
ower liver fire , for jaundice,  hypertension , anxiety, headache  
due to cold or flu, prostate Cancer, 
breast cancer,  red eyes and 
sore throat,  
cough and asthma due to heat syndromes.去 濕熱  ﹐止血，安胎，降 肝陽之火，治煩躁不安，血壓高，  前列腺癌， 
乳癰，風 熱 濕 熱 頭 痛 ， 熱 嗽 喉 腥 ， 定 喘 嗽 ， 
黃 疸 ， 血 熱 ， 吐血，鼻衄， 崩 漏，目赤腫痛 ，乳癰 ，一般癌症 。MedicalFunction:藥理﹕Medical Function:1. effects on digestive system: alcohol extract of huang qin or its ingredient baicalin can promote secretion of bile but another ingredient wogonin does not have this effect. Baicalein can promote movements of extra body intestines of rabbits but wogonin does not have this effect. Huang qin possesses a mild diarrhea effect.2. anti - histamine effect: alkaloids of huang qin possesses antihistamine effect. It can inhibit edema of rats caused by carrageenin.3. anti allergenic effect: alcohol extract of huang qin inhibits acute asthma attack and allergenic eczema. Baicalein has anti-toxin effect,  inhibits permeability of capillaries and anti acetylcholine and anti anaphylaxis effects.4. broad spectrum antibiotic effect5. prevents atherosclerosis6. blood thinning effect: one of the ingredients, Oroxylin A, can  promote an enzyme to produce nitrogen oxide, a potential for stroke and myocardiac infarction therapy.7. anti hepatitis B virus [1]8. decoction of huang qin may prevent and intervene the formation of cirrhosis of the liver [2]藥理﹕一 . 對 消 化 系 統 影 響 : 本 品 醇 抽 取 物 或 其成 份 黃芩苷 ( baicalin )有 促 進 膽 汁 分 泌 作 用 ，　另 一 成份 漢黃芩素 ( wogonin ) 無 此 作 用 。黃 芩 素 ( baicalein ) 對 兔 離 體 腸 管 具 有 運 動亢 進 作 用 ， 但 漢 黃 芩 素 無 此 作 用 。 黃 芩具 有 緩 瀉 作 用 。二 . 抗 炎 症 作 用:  黃 芩鹼 素 類 ， 有 抗 炎 症作 用 ， 對 大 白 鼠 因 卡拉膠(carrageenin) 
  引 起 
  浮 腫 有 顯 著 抑 制 作 用 。三 . 抗 過 敏 作 用 :黃 芩 醇 抽 取 物 抗 過 敏 作 用 ， 對 急 性 氣 喘 及過 敏 性 皮 膚 炎 有 抑 制 效 果 。 黃 芩 素 有 解毒 作 用 ， 抑 制 毛 細 血 管 透 過 性 作 用 ， 抗 乙醯 膽 素 (acetylcholine) 作 用 及 抗 全身型過敏性反應(anaphylaxis) 作 用 。四 . 廣 譜 抗 菌 作 用 : 本 品 濃 液 ， 在 試 管 內 對 革 蘭氏 陽 性 菌 有 抑 制 作 用 。五 . 防 止 粥 狀 動 脈 硬 化 作 用:本 品 水 浸 液 ， 連 續 經 口 給 藥 ， 對 兔 實 驗 性誘 發 之 粥 狀 動 脈 硬 化 症 有 預 防 作 用 。六.  治療腦中風及心肌梗塞等血管病﹕成分千層紙素A(Oroxylin A)，用以抑制誘導性 一氧化氮製造酵素，具治療腦中風及心肌梗塞等血管病的潛能。七. 抗乙型肝炎病毒[1]八.黃芩煎劑可預防和抑制肝硬化[2] Chemical ingredients:化學成 分：

 Dosage:用量:6 to 15 g 3～15 克。Samples of formulae:處方舉例：long dan xie gan tang,  xiao xu ming tang,   xiao chai hu tang, e jiao huang qin tang 龍 膽瀉肝湯, 小續命湯, 小柴胡湯，阿膠黃芩湯。. Modern Research: to be loaded.Cautions:禁 忌 ﹕not to use in case of  pixu (spleen deficient) with weak digestion.  Avoid using huang qin while on blood thinning medication.脾 虛 ，少食，便溏者忌服。用抗凝藥時 須避免同時用黃芩。[1] J Viral Hepat. 2013;20(7):445-452. [2] Hebei Journal of Traditional Chinese Medicine Issue 01, year 2013    河北中医, 2013年 01期carrageenin : Any of a group of closely related colloids derived from Irish moss and several other red algae, widely used as a thickening, stabilizing, emulsifying, or suspending agent in industrial, pharmaceutical, and food products.
